text: "Lady Madonna" is a 1968 song by The Beatles and was released as a buzz single. It was the last single released from Parlophone and all subsequent releases, starting with "Hey Jude" in August 1968 were released on their own label, Apple Records. It topped the charts in Australia, Austria, the Netherlands, New Zealand, Sweden, Switzerland and the United States. == References == Category:1968 songs Category:The Beatles songs Category:Elvis Presley songs Category:Aretha Franklin songs Category:Gary Puckett & The Union Gap songs
title: Lady Madonna
